products.title: Splash Vine Green Electric Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Splash Vine Green Electric Roller Blind in Green. Made to measure from £133.32 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Electric Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our moisture-resistant Splash vine green electric roller blinds have a stylish and modern feel that will update any space.  The lush green roller is a beautiful, contemporary colour which will brighten, and enrich the space with its calming, saturated shade. 
 
Electric blinds are also perfect for hard to reach windows and add a really modern feel to any space, and are cordless and therefore child-safe by design.   At Swift Direct Blinds, when purchasing this blind you will also be able to take advantage of our free 5 year guarantee, which means investing in a piece that will stand the test of time.  
 
 Product ID: DB-ERBX2050 Fabric Colour: Vine Green Material: 100% Polyester Headrail: Durable Aluminium Roller Tube Supported By White Steel Brackets - Top, Face or Side Fix     Control Type: Electric Control Battery Powered Energy Saving Rating: ER2 - Medium Energy Saving Value - Effective Thermal Retention Light Filtering: Yes

products.title: Splash Pear Green Electric Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Splash Pear Green Electric Roller Blind in Green. Made to measure from £133.32 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Electric Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our best-selling Splash range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish which has wonderful light filtering properties.  Perfect for offering privacy without completely blocking out all the light.  Our Splash range is also moisture resistant making it a perfect addition within for kitchens, bathrooms and en-suites.  
 
 This Splash Pear Green electric roller blind will update and brighten any interior. The bright pear green of the fabric will look stunning when paired with natural wooden tones and is the perfect splash of colour to compliment cool, contemporary grey shades. Our electric rollers are inherently child safe as they require no cords to operate & electric roller blinds are perfect for more dificult to reach windows as they can be operated with a remote control. They also introduce an exceptionally modern feel within the space. 
 
 At Swift Direct Blinds, we take quality seriously.  Not only are we situated in the heart of the Yorkshire textile industry, but our own company is also seeped with a rich history, with over 50 years experience making blinds and curtains for home up and down the country.  This green roller blind not only comes with a fabulous 5 year guarantee, for extra peace of mind, but is made by our blind specialists and comes with caring customer-first service. 
 
 Product ID: DB-ERBX2071 Fabric Colour: Pear Green Material: 100% Polyester Headrail: Durable Aluminium Roller Tube Supported By White Steel Brackets - Top, Face or Side Fix     Control Type: Electric Control Battery Powered Energy Saving Rating: ER2 - Medium Energy Saving Value - Effective Thermal Retention Light Filtering: Yes
